## serialization.blocks.BlockSerializer.load() method

Deserializes the blocks defined by the given state into the given workspace.

**Signature:**

```typescript
load(state: {
        languageVersion: number;
        blocks: State[];
    }, workspace: Workspace): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  state | { languageVersion: number; blocks: [State](./blockly.serialization.blocks.state.md)<!-- -->\[\]; } | The state of the blocks to deserialize. |
|  workspace | [Workspace](./blockly.workspace.md) | The workspace to deserialize into. |

**Returns:**

void
